{"id":1192159581,"question_id":3338,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1709434214,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1192159581/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Submatrices with Top-Left Element and Sum Less Than k","memory":"117.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countSubmatrices(int[][] grid, int k) {\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n        \n        int cnt= 0 ;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n            \n            for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n                \n                \n                if(i==0 && j==0){\n                      if(grid[i][j]<=k) cnt++;\n                    continue;\n                        \n                } \n                    \n                else if(i==0) grid[i][j] += grid[i][j-1];\n                else if(j==0) grid[i][j] += grid[i-1][j];\n                else \n                    grid[i][j] += grid[i-1][j] + grid[i][j-1] - grid[i-1][j-1];\n                \n                if(grid[i][j]<=k) {\n                    // System.out.println(i+ \" \"+ j);\n                    cnt++;\n                }\n                \n                \n                // System.out.print(grid[i][j]+ \" ,\");\n            }\n             // System.out.println();\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        return cnt;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-submatrices-with-top-left-element-and-sum-less-than-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
